xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 15 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 01:39 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 02:05 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 02:38 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 03:12 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 03:25 <Kushalk124> has joined #ccm 05:35 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 06:00 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 06:14 <sdumitriu> Good morning 06:15 <BogdanVancea> good morning 06:16 <sdumitriu> Interesting, although it's sunrise, it's getting darker outside 06:16 <sdumitriu> And there was a lovely huge double rainbow earlier 06:17 <sdumitriu> Now the storm is moving over me 06:17 <BogdanVancea> wow, thats some funky weather 06:18 <BogdanVancea> it rained here as well, but its cloudy now 06:18 <BogdanVancea> no rainbows sadly 06:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Good morning :) 06:32 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, Up early this morning ? 06:32 <sdumitriu> Almost every morning 06:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 06:32 <kushalkhandelwal> what's the time ? 06:33 <kushalkhandelwal> its 6:40 :) 06:33 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice 06:33 <kushalkhandelwal> hey BogdanVancea 06:34 <BogdanVancea> hello, kushalkhandelwal 06:34 <BogdanVancea> :) 07:22 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: So, any progress on the issue? 07:23 <BogdanVancea> sdumitriu: a little 07:23 <BogdanVancea> I'm working on a parser 07:23 <BogdanVancea> for the vcf files 07:23 <BogdanVancea> :) 08:08 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 09:48 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 09:59 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:06 <ravigarg27> hey sdumitriu 10:06 <ravigarg27> free? 10:06 <sdumitriu> Hu 10:06 <sdumitriu> Hi 10:08 <ravigarg27> needed some info about the issue 457 10:14 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:16 <ravigarg27> umm sorry for that 10:18 <ravigarg27> can you guide me on how to proceed on that issue 10:18 <sdumitriu> Network issues? 10:18 <ravigarg27> nope actually battery 10:20 <sdumitriu> OK, so first thing first, is it clear what the goal is? 10:21 <ravigarg27> yeah I know what the problem is 10:21 <sdumitriu> Good 10:22 <ravigarg27> But what I am confused about is how it shud look in UI shud there be a message like synonym of mental retardation? 10:23 <ravigarg27> when it is not able to find exact match for the searched query 10:26 <sdumitriu> Hold on 10:34 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:36 <sdumitriu> Welcome back 10:36 <sdumitriu> I updated the issue with two screenshots 10:37 <BogdanVancea> sdumitriu, do you have 5 minutes? 10:37 <sdumitriu> The way I see it is that you should implement a quick edit distance measurement in JavaScript, and compare the user's input to the returned name 10:37 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: Yes, let me finish with Ravi first 10:37 <BogdanVancea> sure :) 10:38 <sdumitriu> If the distance is too large, then get each synonim and compute the distance between the input and the synonim 10:38 <sdumitriu> Remember the best match 10:38 <sdumitriu> Display it 10:38 <sdumitriu> You already have the synonims listed in the response JSON, you just have to process them 10:38 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: Shoot 10:39 <BogdanVancea> I've got some question regarding the vcf's 10:39 <BogdanVancea> do I need to check the metadata section? 10:39 <BogdanVancea> when processing the file? 10:40 <sdumitriu> I don't think so 10:40 <BogdanVancea> I've read that the metadata section is optional, so I'm not sure what to do about it 10:40 <BogdanVancea> from what I've seen, its pretty safe to ignore it 10:40 <sdumitriu> It's not like you can change the schema configuration after reading it 10:41 <BogdanVancea> yeah 10:41 <BogdanVancea> okay, so I'll just pass over it then 10:41 <ravigarg27> umm sry to interrupt but thanx sdumitriu :) 10:41 <sdumitriu> ravigarg27: Did I answer your questions? 10:41 <BogdanVancea> :) 10:42 <BogdanVancea> And I can use a dynamic field for the INFO fiels? 10:42 <sdumitriu> For the whole INFO field? 10:43 <sdumitriu> Or for each subfield? 10:44 <BogdanVancea> for each subfield 10:44 <sdumitriu> Hm, not sure, you decide 10:44 <BogdanVancea> okay then 10:45 <BogdanVancea> I'll continue then 10:45 <ravigarg27> I understood what i have to do; but just a couple more questions 10:45 <BogdanVancea> thanks :) 10:45 <BogdanVancea> and sorry for interrupting earlier, didn;t notice the ongoing discussion 10:47 <ravigarg27> can you just please brief me on the files I need to see or how to search for the relevant code files 10:52 <sdumitriu> There are two places of interest 10:52 <sdumitriu> http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/PhenoTips/Widgets?editor=object&classname=XWiki.JavaScriptExtension&object=0 is the general class that deals with suggestions 10:53 <sdumitriu> http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode?editor=object&classname=XWiki.JavaScriptExtension&object=4 is where the actual suggest for phenotypes is customized 10:56 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:58 <ravigarg27> thanx again sdumitriu :) 11:43 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 12:04 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 13:59 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 17:11 <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm 18:24 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 18:25 <BogdanVancea> sdumitriu, I've made a pull request 18:25 <BogdanVancea> I hope I understood the requirments correctly :) 18:25 <sdumitriu> Yes, looking at it 18:25 <BogdanVancea> ah, ok 18:28 <sdumitriu> Quite long, I'll continue after dinner 18:28 <sdumitriu> Anyway, good job so far 18:30 <BogdanVancea> thanks:) 18:30 <BogdanVancea> well, I'm off to bed, is way past midnight now 18:31 <BogdanVancea> talk to you tommorrow 18:31 <BogdanVancea> bon apetit 18:31 <BogdanVancea> and good night :) 18:32 <sdumitriu> Good night 21:56 <Guest19352> has joined #ccm
